name: Crazy Pong PVP
description:
Story:

Pong got crazy ability! Choose crazy mode in the menu to play with those crazy ability!

Gameplay:

Just like normal pong, plus:

  • The game takes 3 minutes.
  • Extra ball spawned every 30s.
  • Larger ball gives larger score.

Ability:

Name Code Description Freeze FRZ Use to shoot a snowball that will freeze the paddle it hits! Invert Shield ISH Use will make paddle invisible but create a shield around! Illusion Ball IBL Use will make the main ball have 3 duplicates! Make sure to keep an eye on the real one! Sticky Ball SCB Use will make any ball stick on paddle when hit! Allow paddle to control the ball!

Control:

Action COM P1 P2 Game Move Up Auto Key Key Move Down Auto Key Key Choose Ability Auto Key or Key or Use Ability Auto Key Key Back to Menu N/A Key Menu Choose Menu N/A Same as choose ability. Confirm Menu N/A Same as use ability.

Tips:

  • Hold key <U> to show debug.
  • Use illusion ball immediately after hit to affect the main ball direction.
